tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Create consensus sequence by applying VCF variants to a reference fasta file.
tool.command:
cat $reference_fasta | bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section #if $sec_default.fasta_ref: --fasta-ref "${sec_default.fasta_ref}" #end if #if str($sec_default.select_haplotype) != "__none__": --haplotype "${sec_default.select_haplotype}" #end if ${sec_default.iupac_codes} #if $sec_default.mask: --mask "${sec_default.mask}" #end if #if $sec_default.output: --output "${sec_default.output}" #end if #if $sec_default.chain: --chain "${sec_default.chain}" #end if #if $sec_default.sample: --sample "${sec_default.sample}" #end if
## Primary Input/Outputs
$input_file > $output_file

option.value: apply variants for the given haplotype

param.name: iupac_codes
param.label: Iupac Codes
param.help: output variants in the form of IUPAC ambiguity codes

param.name: chain
param.label: Chain
param.help: write a chain file for liftover

param.name: sample
param.label: Sample
param.help: apply variants of the given sample

tool.help: Create consensus sequence by applying VCF variants to a reference fasta file.
